alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:58AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Newton and northwestern Johnson Counties through 930 AM CST... At 858 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Brentwood to near Cass to 6 miles north of Ozark to near Branch. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Hunt... Wolf Pen Campground... Catalpa... Arbaugh... Harmony... Yale... Friley... Fallsville... Oark... Dixon Ridge... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County
